data.comment: The match is underway in Venlo.
Goal! Danilo gives Enschede a 0-1 lead.
In the minute 27, Vaclav Cerny instrumental with a fine assist.
Enschede's Luka Ilic has been booked in Venlo.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Covebo Stadion - De Koel.
Zinedine Machach is replacing Joshua John for the home team.
Goal! Enschede extend their lead to 0-2 through Luka Ilic.
In the minute 70, Goal for Venlo! They are now just 1-2 behind thanks to a Evert Linthorst header.
Lukas Schmitz (Venlo) has received a yellow card from Serdar Gozubuyuk.
Vito Van Crooij for Venlo has been booked by Serdar Gozubuyuk and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 81, Hans De Koning (Venlo) is making a second substitution, with Stan Van Dijck replacing Lukas Schmitz.
Danilo (Enschede) has received a first yellow card.
Ron Jans is making the team's first substitution at Covebo Stadion - De Koel with Dario Dumic replacing Luka Ilic.
In the minute 88, Alexander Jeremejeff is replacing Danilo for Enschede at Covebo Stadion - De Koel.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-2.
The away team replace Vaclav Cerny with Halil Dervisoglu.
